name: Only one life
description:
See you soon, dad.

A father in distress is wandering through jazzy alleys. He's looking for something. Trouble? A dangerous cocktail? People are waiting at Beetea's Club. Someone is waiting for something. Be careful you only live once.

Made in 48h by:
Mirko-RawFury: Programming
frulica: Art, Animation & Design
alexzen: Sound Design & Music

Control Scheme:
Movement: Arrow keys
Shoot: W
Reload: E
Start Aiming: R
Skip Dialog: Just Shoot! ; )
